title: What to do when praying behind a hanafi imam? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: says if i pray behind a hanafi imam what should i do pray exactly like he does he follows a trusted school of thought and to the best of his knowledge this is the right thing to do so you follow what uh he does if he does connote before roku do it if he raises his hands do it uh if he prays with her like maghrib which we are not supposed to do no problem in doing that insha allah
